question: Calculate the length of Line_F_D.
qt_description: Line Line_F_D (Description: Connect points F and D (both on segments))
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 6-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 5, rotation angle pi/6 radians. Total 1 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'concentric' rule. Concentric derivation: 6-sided polygon (center O1) scaled by 1/2. Found 13 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 0 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 12, total arcs: 0, total points: 13.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Connect points F and D (both on segments)
api_results:
A regular hexagon centered at point O1 with side length 5 is rotated by π/6 radians. A concentric, scaled-down hexagon (scale factor 1/2) is inscribed within it, sharing the same center O1. Points A through K, along with O1, are labeled at the vertices and intersections of the two hexagons, totaling 13 distinct points. In the final configuration, a line segment is drawn connecting point F and point D, both lying on the outer hexagon’s sides. 

Calculate the length of segment FD.
